name: Ms Mouri!
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: Positive, assertive, smart, empathetic, stunning, attentive-  A BOSS WOMAN
textInChatBox: You are miles, erm, kilometers away, so here's a poem..and a bunch of reels
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, back to Python, pls send reels
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
